MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Shining Tree Project in North America dated October 2008

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Shining Tree Project in North America dated October 2008
document.description: The report covers Platinex's Shining Tree gold project, comprising 44 claims in the Larder Lake Mining Division, Ontario, Canada, and discusses the property's geology, mineralization, and proposed work program.
